name: Oidemase, Kokuri-san
storyline:
“Kokuri-san, Kokuri-san, please come see us.”

When you fearlessly chant the “Kokuri-san” spell at school in the middle of the night, what appeared was a surprisingly cute little fox named Kurune Kokuri.

And so begins the investigation of the Seven Wonders of School by you and Kurune Kokuri…
summary: Oidemase, Kokuri-san is a visual novel starring the VTuber Kurune Kokuri. The story is fully voiced, and will include scenes with realistic ASMR voices, so you can enjoy the scenario “as if you were there.”
